Package com.company.Controller

Class RegistrationSystem

java.lang.Object
com.company.Controller.RegistrationSystem
public class RegistrationSystem extends Object
RegistrationSystem class storing repo lists of: students, teachers, courses Functionalities: enrolling a student to a course, showing courses with free places, showing all courses, showing all students enrolled to a course, deleting a course from a teacher, updating students' total credits number after updating a course credits

  • Method Details

    • register

      public boolean register(Course course, Student student) throws InputException
      Parameters:
      course - , Course object
      student - , Student object
      Returns:
      true if successfully enroled, else false
      Throws:
      InputException - if course or student params not existing in repo lists or if student can not enroll to that given course under the following conditions Conditions: student can have maximal 30 credits and a course has a maximum number of enrolled students, student can not be enrolled multiple times to the same course

    • retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces

      public List<Course> retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces()
      Returns:
      courses with free places find courses from the course repo where number of enrolled students is less maximum enroll limit

    • retrieveStudentsEnrolledForACourse

      public List<Student> retrieveStudentsEnrolledForACourse(Course course)
      Parameters:
      course - Course object
      Returns:
      list of students enrolled to the given course, or null if course is NULL

    • deleteCourseFromTeacher

      public boolean deleteCourseFromTeacher(Teacher teacher, Course course) throws InputException
      Parameters:
      teacher - Teacher object from whom we delete a course
      course - Course object, from the teacher's list, to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if successfully deleted
      Throws:
      InputException - if teacher or course do not exist in te repo lists, or if the course does not correspond to that teacher deleting course from the teacher's teaching list, from the students enrolled list and from the courses repo Removing course from the teacher's courses list, from the students' enrolled lists and from the course repo Update number of credits of certain students

    • updateStudentsCredits

      public void updateStudentsCredits()
      Recalculate the sum of credits provided from the enrolled courses of the students Update the credits sum for each student

      public void modifyCredits(Course c)
